com.xtructure.xutil
Class StringConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xutil.StringConverter

public final class StringConverter
extends java.lang.Object

A set of utilities for converting between strings and primitive types.

Version:
0.9.4
Author:
Peter Nürnberg

Converts the given string to a boolean.

Parameters:
str - the string to be converted
Returns:
the boolean equivalent to the given string

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given string is null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if str does not match BOOLEAN_VALUE_REGEX
